instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must automatically generate invoice numbers in sequential order.
output:
Scenario: Invoice number increments correctly
Given the last invoice number is INV-00099
When a new invoice is created
Then invoice number is INV-00100

Scenario: Invoice numbers are unique
Given two invoices created simultaneously
When both are saved
Then each has a unique invoice number

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Users must be able to bookmark favorite items for quick access.
output:
Scenario: Item is bookmarked successfully
Given a user is viewing a product
When user clicks the bookmark icon
Then item is added to favorites list

Scenario: Bookmark can be removed
Given an item is bookmarked
When user clicks the bookmark icon again
Then item is removed from favorites list

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The calendar view must highlight today's date and allow navigation between months.
output:
Scenario: Today's date is highlighted
Given user opens the calendar view
When calendar is displayed
Then current date is visually highlighted

Scenario: Month navigation works
Given user is viewing January 2024
When user clicks next month arrow
Then February 2024 is displayed

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must validate that uploaded files have allowed extensions only.
output:
Scenario: Allowed file type accepted
Given a file upload accepting PDF and DOCX
When user uploads 'document.pdf'

Scenario: Disallowed file type rejected
Given a file upload accepting PDF and DOCX

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Comments must support @mentions to notify other users.

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The dashboard must show real-time analytics with charts and metrics.

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: User avatars must have a default image when no custom photo is uploaded.
output:
Scenario: Default avatar shown for new users

When profile is viewed

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must support drag-and-drop for reordering list items.
output:
Scenario: Item can be dragged to new position

Scenario: Order change persists after refresh

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Error messages must be cleared when the user corrects the invalid input.
output:
Scenario: Error clears on valid input
Given an error message is displayed for invalid email
When user enters a valid email
Then error message disappears

Scenario: Error persists until corrected
Given an error message is displayed
When user clicks elsewhere without fixing
Then error message remains visible

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The print function must generate a printer-friendly version of the page.
output:
